title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
OB: When clicking on 'OK' and then reopening the hyperlink builder, its title becomes 'www.actuate.com' instead of 'Hyperlink Options'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should always be 'Hyperlink Options', even after reopening it or changing settings.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Click on 'OK' to close the hyperlink builder.
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
